H0.text: What is Britain’s bestselling breakfast cereal. Cornflakes

H1.text: What is Britain’s bestselling breakfast cereal. Coco Pops

H2.text: What is Britain’s bestselling breakfast cereal. Shreddies

H3.text: What is Britain’s bestselling breakfast cereal. Weetabix

A4.text: Force wheat flakes were Britain's best-selling breakfast cereal in 1930, selling 12.5 million packages in one year.

A5.text: In 1902, Force wheat flakes became the first ready-to-eat breakfast cereal introduced into the United Kingdom.

A6.text: Corn flakes are a popular food item in the United Kingdom where over 6 million households consume them.
